title: Solve for $$t$$ in the x(t) Equation
text: Solve for $$t$$ in the x(t) equation, we have $$t=\frac{1}{4} x+\frac{1}{4}$$.

title: Substitute $$t$$ Into the y(t) Equation
text: Substitute $$t=\frac{1}{4} x+\frac{1}{4}$$ into the y(t) equation, we have $$y=4\left(\frac{1}{4} x+\frac{1}{4}\right)+2=x+3$$
